name: Arkanoidice
description:
Made for the GMTK Game Jam 2022. 

An Arkanoid-esque  breakout game with a twist: Every time a tile breaks, your paddle size and number of balls is changed by a random amount. Features 7 levels of content and arcade-style gameplay.

Controls: 

  • Mouse over to move paddle
  • Q to quit game (Downloaded Files Only)
  • R to restart level (Assist Mode)
  • LMB to slow down game (Assist Mode
